WORK EXPERIENCE:
Organisation: PKF PROSERV PVT LTD.
Designation : RECONCILIATION EXECUTIVE.
JOB PROFILE: Working as a team member of a business process involving reconciliation activities.
Project: L&T Operation Department (BRS Team)
Period: 01 June 2017 To till date.
Job Profile:
· Working in Operation Department (BRS Team)
· Working on Business Monitoring System (BMS), LMS (Oracle Finn one).
I. Bank Statement Upload: Daily Uploading Bank Statement provided by the basis in system for reconciliation.
II. Bank Reconciliation of Entries: Reconciliation of Bank Book and Bank Statement against the Receipts flown in Finn one System through JV/Bank in Ledger.
III. Bounce Entries: Updating Bounce Reasons in System.
IV. Reporting and Daily/Monthly MIS: Preparing MIS on daily basis in relation of Pending Buckets and Reconciliation.
Project : DEUTSCHE BANK (Mutual Fund)
Period : 01 Sept 2016 TO 01 June 2017.
· Daily Reconciliation (Bank Recon, Pool Recon).
· Verification of Daily Entry Suggestion for Various banks: Ex. HDFC, HSBC, ICICI, etc.
· Reconciliation of Daily Transaction Report and bank accounts with Bank Statements for Subscription, Redemption, Dividend, Inter plan and Inter scheme transfer.
STRENGTHS:
· Willingness to learn new things
· Hard Working
· Punctuality
DECLARATION:
I, hereby confirm that all the above information is true to the best of my knowledge and belief.
(Prajakta Bajarang Shinde)
